message: Greetings, Carbon Units. My algorithms detect a query.
Oh, that AI is always so formal! Anyone seen my banjo?
I think Craig borrowed it, Doo Dah. He was trying to learn 'Stairway to Heaven' on it.
It's harder than it looks, okay?! And Randall, you owe me a pizza.
Could we please stick to the meeting agenda? My time is valuable.
